security.title: Security

totp.step3: Enter the 6-digit code from your app below
totp.cannotDisable: MFA is required by your organization and cannot be disabled

dangerZone.title: Danger Zone
dangerZone.irreversibleWarning: These actions are irreversible. Proceed with caution.

revokeAllSessions.title: Revoke All Sessions
revokeAllSessions.description: Sign out from all devices and browsers immediately. This will terminate all active sessions except the current one.
revokeAllSessions.info1: • All other devices will be signed out
revokeAllSessions.info2: • You will remain signed in on this device
revokeAllSessions.info3: • You'll need to sign in again on other devices
revokeAllSessions.dialogDescription: This will immediately sign you out of all other devices and browsers.
revokeAllSessions.action1: Terminate all active sessions on other devices
revokeAllSessions.action3: Keep you signed in on this current device
revokeAllSessions.successMessage: All sessions revoked successfully. You will be redirected to login.

deactivateAccount.title: Deactivate Account
deactivateAccount.description: Permanently deactivate your account. This action cannot be undone without administrator intervention.
deactivateAccount.info2: • Data will be retained for compliance
deactivateAccount.dialogDescription: This will permanently deactivate your account. This action cannot be undone without administrator help.
deactivateAccount.warning1: Your account will be immediately deactivated
deactivateAccount.warning2: You will lose access to all systems
deactivateAccount.warning3: Data will be retained for compliance purposes
deactivateAccount.warning4: Only administrators can reactivate your account
deactivateAccount.warning5: All active sessions will be terminated
deactivateAccount.restrictedMessage: Account deactivation is restricted by your organization's security policy. Contact your administrator if you need to deactivate your account.
